title: Bookstores
intro: Discover the most beautiful and unique reading spaces across Taiwan, from massive flagship stores to cozy independent bookshops.

spots.name: Eslite Spectrum Pingtung (誠品生活 屏東店)
spots.description: Located on the 5th floor of Pacific Department Store. A refined reading space serving book lovers in Pingtung City.

spots.name: Eslite Spectrum Kaohsiung Far Eastern (誠品生活 高雄大遠百店)
spots.description: Located in the Sanduo Shopping District (17F). Famous for its stepped reading area offering excellent views of the harbor city.

spots.name: Kingstone Books Sanduo (金石堂 高雄三多店)
spots.description: [New in 2024] Located in Shin Kong Mitsukoshi (2F). A modern, bright reading space serving the Sanduo commercial area.

spots.name: Eslite Spectrum Pier-2 (誠品生活 駁二店)
spots.description: Located in Warehouse C4 of the Pier-2 Art Center. The closest Eslite to the sea, featuring a unique industrial design.

spots.name: TSUTAYA BOOKSTORE Kaohsiung Talee (高雄大立店)
spots.description: The first Tsutaya in Southern Taiwan. Features a refined red brick design and combines with WIRED CHAYA tea house.

spots.name: Takao Books (三餘書店)
spots.description: The most representative independent bookstore in Kaohsiung. Located in an old house, focusing on local culture and social issues.

spots.name: Chengfeng Books (承風書店)
spots.description: Located on the 7th floor of TAI Urban Resort. Offers a stunning high-altitude view of the harbor.

spots.name: Eslite Spectrum T.S. Mall (誠品生活 南紡店)
spots.description: The largest Eslite bookstore in Tainan, located within the T.S. Mall. A comprehensive cultural hub.

spots.name: Ubuntu Bookstore Huanhe (烏邦圖書店 環河店)
spots.description: Known as the 'Bookstore Floating on Water'. A pure white space located right next to the Anping Canal.

spots.name: Ubuntu Bookstore Main Library (烏邦圖書店 總圖店)
spots.description: Located inside the Tainan Public Library Main Branch. A quiet and artistic reading corner.

spots.name: Cheng-Chung Bookstores (政大書城)
spots.description: A legendary book haven for locals located on Ximen Road. Known for its generous discounts and wide selection.

spots.name: Nannan Books (南南本屋)
spots.description: A hidden gem in the alleyways of Tainan, offering a curated selection of books and a cozy atmosphere.

spots.name: Eslite Spectrum Chiayi Art Museum (嘉義美術館限定店)
spots.description: Housed in the historic wing of the art museum. Features beautiful lake-green door frames and vintage window grilles.

spots.name: Kingstone Books Nice Plaza (金石堂 嘉義耐斯店)
spots.description: Located in Nice Plaza. A key bookstore serving the Chiayi region with a comfortable reading environment.

spots.name: Hong Ya Book (洪雅書房)
spots.description: A legendary independent bookstore known for its active engagement in social movements and environmental issues.

spots.name: Books.com.tw Dream Plaza (博客來實體旗艦店)
spots.description: [New in 2025] The first physical flagship store of Taiwan's largest online bookseller, located in Xinyi District. Open 24 hours.

spots.name: Eslite Spectrum Songyan (誠品生活松菸店)
spots.description: The new 24-hour bookstore successor. Located in the Songshan Cultural Park, combining a cinema, performance hall, and vinyl records.

spots.name: TSUTAYA BOOKSTORE Xinyi (信義店)
spots.description: Located in Uni-President Department Store. Offers a refined lifestyle reading experience in the heart of Xinyi District.

spots.name: Eslite Spectrum NTU (誠品生活 台大店)
spots.description: Located in Da'an District near National Taiwan University. A hub for academic and literary works.

spots.name: Boven Magazine Library (Boven 雜誌圖書館)
spots.description: Located in Da'an District. The world's first library dedicated to magazines. A must-visit for designers (Entrance fee required).

spots.name: Eslite Spectrum Nanxi (誠品生活 南西店)
spots.description: Located in the trendy Zhongshan District. Formerly a cinema, it retains a high-ceiling theater-like reading space.

spots.name: Eslite R79 (誠品 R79)
spots.description: Taiwan's longest underground book street, connecting Zhongshan and Shuanglian MRT stations. A cultural promenade.

spots.name: Eslite Spectrum Xindian (誠品生活新店)
spots.description: Located in Yes!Life Mall. Features a spectacular 30-meter high atrium and massive red brick arches.

spots.name: Small Books (小小書房)
spots.description: Hidden in the alleys of Yonghe. A small but influential independent bookstore with deep cultural roots.

spots.name: Sea To See Bookstore (見書店)
spots.description: Located in E-Square, this independent bookstore features a blue ocean-themed design representing Keelung's harbor spirit.

spots.name: TSUTAYA BOOKSTORE Taoyuan Arts Plaza (桃園藝文店)
spots.description: Hailed as one of the most beautiful Tsutaya stores in Taiwan, located in the cultural arts district.

spots.name: Qing Geng Yu Du Bookstore (晴耕雨讀小書院)
spots.description: A charming countryside bookstore in Longtan with a grassy lawn, embodying the lifestyle of 'farming when sunny, reading when rainy'.

spots.name: TSUTAYA BOOKSTORE Hsinchu Nanya (新竹湳雅店)
spots.description: Features a stunning two-story high circular book wall that offers a visually immersive reading experience.

spots.name: Or Book Store (或者書店)
spots.description: Located in the New Tile House Hakka Cultural District, combining reading with dining in a cultural setting.

spots.name: Eslite Spectrum Park Lane (勤美綠園道店)
spots.description: Famous for its vertical garden walls and location along the Calligraphy Greenway, creating a nature-infused reading vibe.

spots.name: TSUTAYA BOOKSTORE Taichung Municipal (台中市政店)
spots.description: Located in the 7th Redevelopment Zone. A spacious and stylish bookstore offering a premium lifestyle experience.

spots.name: Central Bookstore (中央書局)
spots.description: A century-old cultural landmark in Taichung's Central District, recently revitalized as a modern reading and dining space.

spots.name: TSUTAYA BOOKSTORE Sun Moon Town (日月町店)
spots.description: [New in 2024] Located in Puli on the way to Sun Moon Lake. A lifestyle bookstore combining exhibitions and dining.

spots.name: Nanfang Bookstore (南方書店)
spots.description: A historic bookstore near Changhua Railway Station with a retro atmosphere, witnessing the city's history.

spots.name: Rirong Book House (日榮本屋)
spots.description: A warm independent bookstore located near Miaoli Railway Station, fostering local connections.

spots.name: Eslite Spectrum Huwei (誠品生活虎尾店)
spots.description: Located inside the historic Huwei Contract Office, formerly a police station. A unique blend of history and books.

spots.name: Salon de Huwei (虎尾厝沙龍)
spots.description: An independent bookstore hidden in an old alley house, exuding a strong atmosphere of European salons.

spots.name: Eslite Spectrum Yilan (誠品生活 宜蘭店)
spots.description: Located in Luna Plaza. A key cultural landmark for residents and visitors in Yilan City.

spots.name: Old Book Cabinet (舊書櫃)
spots.description: A nostalgic used bookstore converted from an old warehouse next to Yilan Train Station.

spots.name: Eslite Spectrum Hualien (誠品生活 花蓮店)
spots.description: Located in Far Eastern Department Store. Provides a rich selection of books and lifestyle products for Eastern Taiwan.

spots.name: Time Used Books (時光二手書店)
spots.description: A cozy Japanese-style wooden house bookstore with cats, offering a peaceful reading environment.

spots.name: Kingstone Books Taitung (金石堂 台東店)
spots.description: Located on Zhonghua Road. The main chain bookstore serving the Taitung community.

spots.name: Huang Huang Used Books (晃晃二手書店)
spots.description: A hub for backpackers and work-exchange travelers, offering books, accommodation, and local stories.

spots.name: Along the Chrysanthemum (沿菊書店)
spots.description: Located in the Duhsing 10th Village, this bookstore is deeply rooted in Penghu's local culture and history.

spots.name: Red Balloon Books (紅氣球書屋)
spots.description: Taiwan's southernmost independent bookstore in Hengchun. Combines a homestay with selected books.

spots.name: Akau Books (繫。本屋)
spots.description: Located within the Victory Star Village. Dedicated to researching Pingtung's diverse ethnic groups and food culture.

spots.name: New Kinmen Bookstore (新金門書局)
spots.description: A historic local bookstore serving the Kinmen islands, preserving the reading culture of the front line.
